entry.title: Thursday: Chance of light snow or freezing drizzle. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of freezing drizzle late this morning then 60 percent chance of light snow. Fog at times late this morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CDT Thursday 27 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog at times overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CDT Thursday 27 April 2023
